top_comments.comment: I'm not familiar with these young ladies at all. However, I am familiar with Billie. I must say you all did a fantastic job creating this awesome rendition to her hit song "Happier than ever". Billie will be so very proud... you ladies rock!!!❤❤❤❤❤❤

OMG! I cry. Soooo good! ❤️ Greetings from Germany 🥰
